title: PLEASE HELP ME RIOT!

embed.description: Current outage and issues map for League of Legends.

body:
Ever since I was disconnected from the server 2 days ago in the middle of an Aram, I have not been able to login to any of my accounts/have not been able to finish authenticating while attempting to login. 

After I submit my login information, either I am permanently stuck in a loading screen  while it says "authenticating...", or I receive the message that an unexpected error has ocuured.

I have tried all of the potentials solutions that are provided on the support website, tried potential solutions found on many similar threads, and even did a  complete reset of my computer, but nothing has worked.

 League worked perfectly fin up to this point, and by resetting my computer I would originate back to the original setting that league was functioning on.At this point I have kind of concluded that the issue must not be on my side, but rather with the server. 

In my frustration I stumbled across this website, and it looks like I am not the only person in my area (Pullman Washington) that has had issues.

 At this point I am just curious if Riot would be able to fix the issue, and how long it would be.

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the trouble you've been having.  :(  Were you able to check your ISP's support to see if something is going on.  If so, is everything okay now?
Thanks so sumch for the quick response! So it doies seem that the issue is with the service provider. I submitted a service request with them, now it should be more or less a waiting game.
